Package kademlia.dht

Class StorageEntryMetadata

java.lang.Object
kademlia.dht.StorageEntryMetadata
All Implemented Interfaces:
KademliaStorageEntryMetadata
public class StorageEntryMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
implements KademliaStorageEntryMetadata
Keeps track of data for a Content stored in the DHT Used by the StorageEntryManager class
Since:
20140226
